name: Bike Masters
overview:
Race as one of the fastest riders in the world in Bike Masters, the newest bike-racing game for AmstradCPC.

Conquest six different cups scaling up in dificulty! Speed up with turbos while avoiding potholes, speed bumps, and falling prey to the plant that lives within the puddle.

This game was developed for the CPCRetroDev 2019 competition, scoring 5th place and winning Best Student Game and Best Opera Prima Additional Mention.

Official Selection - Valencia Indie Summit 2020.

The game is heavily influenced by the NES classic, Excitebike.
